name: Table Manners (itch) (artemetto)
description:
The annual dinner party on spaceship Delta N18 is in full swing, but your plate is already empty... Stomach still grumbling, you go for seconds. They won't mind, right?

CONTROLS:

Hold left/right arrows to aim for food.
Hold Space to eat it.
Esc to back out and return to main screen.

DON'T GET CAUGHT.
